tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PressureData (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    pressure DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Location (
    location_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Sensor (
    sensor_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR,
    location_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE PressureChange (
    change_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    pressure_delta DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE atmospheric_pressure_changes ( 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY, 
    pressure DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE pressure_patterns ( 
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    pattern_name STRING, 
    description STRING 
)

CREATE TABLE pressure_locations ( 
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    location_name STRING 
)

CREATE TABLE pressure_readings ( 
    reading_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    pressure DECIMAL, 
    location_id UUID REFERENCES pressure_locations(location_id) 
)

CREATE TABLE detected_patterns ( 
    pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    pattern_name STRING, 
    location_id UUID REFERENCES pressure_locations(location_id) 
)
